# Logisim PLA program table
# 
#   x x x T C Z
#

00000 000000 # CLR
10000 000000 # SER

00001 000001 # NOT
10001 000101 # TWO

00010 000001 # AND
10010 000001 # NAND

00011 000001 # OR
10011 000001 # NOR

00100 000001 # XOR
10100 000001 # XNOR

00101 000011 # ADD
10101 000011 # ADC

00110 000111 # SUB
10110 000111 # SBC

00111 000011 # INC
10111 000111 # DEC

01000 000001 # MOV
11000 000001 # MVN

01001 000000 # SET
11001 000000 # STN

01010 000111 # CMP
